scripts.build: yarn run build:web && yarn run prebuild
scripts.build:web: yarn run export && node exportClientExpoConfig.js > dist/expoConfig.json
scripts.prebuild:
EXPO_NO_GIT_STATUS=1 expo prebuild --clean && sed -i.bak 's/org.gradle.jvmargs=-Xmx2048m -XX:MaxMetaspaceSize=512m/org.gradle.jvmargs=-Xmx8192m -XX:MaxMetaspaceSize=2048m/' android/gradle.properties && echo '
networkTimeout=100000' >> android/gradle.properties && sed -i.bak  's/plugins { id("com.facebook.react.settings") }//' android/settings.gradle && yarn run find-node
scripts.postinstall: which pod && yarn run postinstall-ios || echo 'not a mac, not installing pods'
scripts.postinstall-ios: cd ios && pod install && yarn run find-node
scripts.code-signing-dev: mkdir -p code-signing-dev/keys code-signing-dev/certs && expo-updates codesigning:generate --key-output-directory code-signing-dev/keys --certificate-output-directory code-signing-dev/certs --certificate-validity-duration-years 10 --certificate-common-name 'Aquareum'
